metadata.title: Seeking the Lost Tome of Shadows
metadata.description: Deep within the ancient ruins, Eldrin discovers a hidden chamber containing an ancient tome bound in shadowy leather. The text speaks of forbidden knowledge and dark rituals that could either free him from his curse or seal it forever.

objectives.description: Locate the entrance to the hidden chamber within the Blackspire Ruins.
Retrieve the ancient tome from the chamber and decipher its secrets.
